price: 5. Yalli iisa Ruumuh yeceemih sabbatah. Yalli isih faxa mara qoklaah, isih faxa mara boolaysa. Kaadu Usuk mayso-li, nacrur-li.
arabic: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: binaṣri al-lahi yanṣuru man yashāu wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
